FAQs.question: How long are the internships?
FAQs.answer: Internship duration varies by company and project. It could vary from 1 week to a few months. You can choose to apply based on your availability. All internships are part-time

FAQs.question: Are the internships in a group or individually?
FAQs.answer: It differs based on a companyâ€™s requirements. We support both.

FAQs.question: Can I do an internship again if I have done it before?
FAQs.answer: You can do an internship as many times as you want.

FAQs.question: What are the minimum and maximum ages to be eligible for an internship?
FAQs.answer: The minimum age is 14 years old and the maximum age is 19 years old.

FAQs.question: Are the internships paid?
FAQs.answer: No, unfortunately, there are laws preventing that. Companies provide interns with official certificates and reward coupons
